H3.text: Who was Pope during World War Two. PPXII

A4.text: Pope Pius XII was head of the Catholic Church from 2 March 1939 until his death on 9 October 1958.

A5.text: Pius XII's papacy spanned the entire duration of World War II (1939â€“1945).
